General.Name: Muyuan Foodstuff Co Ltd
General.Description: Muyuan Foods Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, operates in the hog industry in China. It provides feed processing, pig breeding, breeding pig breeding, commercial pig breeding, and meat slaughtering services. Muyuan Foods Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Nanyang, China.
